title: Gasoline price per liter in selected countries - December 2019
yAxis: Price per liter in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Price per liter in U.S. dollars 1.76 is found at Country Italy and the minimum is found at United States where Country is 0.68.
The highest value at Country Italy is 2.59x times more than the lowest value at United States.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Price per liter in U.S. dollars and United States has the lowest Price per liter in U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Price per liter in U.S. dollars and United States has the lowest Price per liter in U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Price per liter in U.S. dollars is found at Country France.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars of Country United States is 2.59% smaller than the maximum value at Italy.
Country Italy is higher than any other Countrys with value 1.76, followed by France, and United Kingdom. Down to Country United States with the lowest value 0.68.
The Country United States tends to be 1.28 percent lower than average.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is 11.01 if we add up values of all Countrys.
